directions: Stir flour, paprika and red pepper in shallow dish. Season fish with salt. Coat with flour mixture, shaking off excess. Heat oil in heavy large skillet over medium-high heat. Add fish and cook until golden brown and cooked through, about 4 minutes per side.
Transfer fish to plates. Serve with Almond Tarator.
title: Turkish Sauteed Sea Bass with Almond Tarator
